abstract: Reliance Industries, owner of the world’s largest oil-refining complex, raised its offer for bankrupt LyondellBasell Industries to about $14.5 billion, two people with knowledge of the offer told Bloomberg News.
snippet: Reliance Industries, owner of the world’s largest oil-refining complex, raised its offer for bankrupt LyondellBasell Industries to about $14.5 billion, two people with knowledge of the offer told Bloomberg News.
lead_paragraph: Reliance Industries, owner of the world’s largest oil-refining complex, raised its offer for the bankrupt LyondellBasell Industries to about $14.5 billion, two people with knowledge of the offer told Bloomberg News.

headline.main: Reliance Said to Bid $14.5 Billion for Lyondell
